name: Klean Kanteen Classic Stainless Steel Vacuum Insulated Bottle 950ml
categories: Classic Stainless Steel Vacuum Insulated Bott
description: A good-sized bottle with amazing insulating properties. Keeps hot stuff steaming for up to 24 hours and iced drinks cool for up to 90 hours. Yes, 90.Made of food-grade 18/8 stainless steel.Klean Coat™ finish is resistant to chipping and daily wear and tear.44mm opening accepts ice cubes and is easy to open and fill.Vacuum-insulated: keeps drinks warm for 24 hours and cool for up to 90 hours.
